channel.title: Posts on CodeBugs
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on CodeBugs

item.title: Final season
item.description: This is my final season in volleyball league of unversity town during my master career. We lost the first game vs Peking University. As the slogan of Cetics which is the famous team in NBA says: What hurts more the pain of hard work or the pain of regret. Alouth we lost the game. But we have tried our best expecially the have a volleyball player who is 2.02 meters high and is opposite in the Greek national youth team.
item.content:
This is my final season in volleyball league of unversity town during my master career. We lost the first game vs Peking University.

As the slogan of Cetics which is the famous team in NBA says: What hurts more the pain of hard work or the pain of regret. Alouth we lost the game. But we have tried our best expecially the have a volleyball player who is 2.02 meters high and is opposite in the Greek national youth team. Never mindï¼Œnever give up.

item.title: Exchange experience in Russia
item.description: Thanks for 2 doctors(Dr.Wang & Dr. Jiang) leading us in Russia for our exchange study. Here is the team. Both for fun and study!
item.content:
Thanks for 2 doctors(Dr.Wang & Dr. Jiang) leading us in Russia for our exchange study.

Here is the team.

Both for fun and study!
